    "note that operators ( [ reyn ] ) are often used in representation theory of finite groups ( see @xcite , @xcite , @xcite ) .",
    "we use these operators in clifford algebras to obtain some new properties .",
    "we present a relation between these operators and projection operators onto fixed subspaces of clifford algebras .",

    "so if basis element commutes with some basis element , then it commutes with adjoint basis element .",
    "but we know from theorem [ theoremcommbas2 ] that basis elements ( except @xmath31 and @xmath132 ) commutes with @xmath118 basis elements and anticommutes with @xmath118 basis elements .",
    "so we obtain the statement of theorem for the case of odd @xmath7 .",
    "if @xmath7 is even then even ( not odd ) basis element commutes with @xmath132 .",
    "so if even basis element commutes with some basis element , then it commutes with adjoint basis element .",

  ],
  "abstract_text": [
    "<S> in this paper we consider different operators acting on clifford algebras . </S>",
    "<S> we consider reynolds operator of salingaros vee group . </S>",
    "<S> this operator `` average '' an action of salingaros vee group on clifford algebra . </S>",
    "<S> we consider conjugate action on clifford algebra .    </S>",
    "<S> we present a relation between these operators and projection operators onto fixed subspaces of clifford algebras . using method of averaging we present solutions of system of commutator equations . </S>"
  ]
}
